metadata.title: Cape St. James Wave Buoy Data
metadata.description: High-frequency radar wave buoy spectra, from a buoy deployed off Cape St. James, August, 1991.
keywords: North Inner Coast (QCS, Hecate, Dixon Inlet and passages)
